item.description:
Mindfulness is a powerful technique for cultivating conscious awareness and a greater sense of well being. This meetup will include guided mindfulness meditation practices followed by a discussion. You can join us online at: www.anymeeting.com/MBSRonline1 or call in at: 213-416-1560, access code:865 1933

In addition to this free session, I also have several online mindfulness programs coming up. Please check check the websites below for more information:

www.mbsr-online.com
http://www.whole-living.eventbrite.com/
item.name: Mindful Moment-webcast
